void dg(int l, int r) 
{
    if (l == r) {//è¯´æ˜åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¾“å‡ºï¼ 
        cout << a[r];//ä¸è¦æ¢è¡Œï¼ä¸è¦ç©ºæ ¼ï¼

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int n, a[1005], f[1005][1005], p[1005][1005], sum[1005];
int query(int i, int j) 
{ 
	return sum[j] - sum[i - 1]; 
}
void dg(int l, int r) 
{
    if (l == r) {
        cout << a[r];
        return;
    }
    cout << '(';
    int mid = p[l][r];
    dg(l, mid);
    cout << ")(";
    dg(mid + 1, r);
    cout << ')';
}
int main() {
    memset(f, 27, sizeof(f));
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) 
	{
        cin >> a[i];
        sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + a[i];
        f[i][i] = 0;
    }
    for (int k = 2; k <= n; k++)
	{ 
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) 
		{
            int j = i + k - 1;
            for (int l = i; l < j; l++)
			 {
                if (f[i][j] > f[i][l] + f[l + 1][j] + query(i, j)) 
				{
                    f[i][j] = f[i][l] + f[l + 1][j] + query(i, j);
                    p[i][j] = l;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    cout << f[1][n] << endl; 
    dg(1, n);
    return 0;
}

è®°å¿†åŒ–æœç´¢æ›´åŠ æ¸…æ™°ï¼Œæ˜“äºç†è§£

è®°å¿†åŒ–éƒ¨åˆ†å’ŒåŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’å¾ˆåƒï¼Œå› ä¸ºæˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“äº†èµ·ç‚¹iå’Œç»ˆç‚¹j

æ‰€ä»¥å¤„ç†å®Œè¾¹ç•Œåï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥æšä¸¾ä¸­ç‚¹

long dg(int i, int j) 
{
    if(i==j)return 0;//è¾¹ç•Œï¼Œè‡ªå·±åˆå¹¶è‡ªå·±ä¸éœ€è¦ä»£ä»·
    if (f[i][j] != -1) //å¦‚æœè®¡ç®—äº†ï¼Œè¿”å›
	{
        return f[i][j];
    }
    f[i][j]=1E9;
    for (int k = i; k <= j; k++) //è®¡ç®—
	{
        if (f[i][j] > dg(i, k) + dg(k + 1, j) + w(i, j)) //æ³¨æ„!ç”¨dgè¡¨ç¤ºå­é—®é¢˜ï¼
		{
            f[i][j] = dg(i, k) + dg(k + 1, j) + w(i, j);
            p[i][j] = k;//è®°å½•ä¸­ç‚¹
        }
    }
    return f[i][j];//è¿”å›
}

ä¸Šä»£ç ï¼š

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

inline int read() {
    int ans = 0;
    char c = getchar();
    while ((c < '0' || c > '9') && (c != '-')) {
        c = getchar();
    }
    ans = c - '0';
    c = getchar();
    while (c >= '0' && c <= '9') {
        ans = (ans << 3) + (ans << 1) + c - '0';
        c = getchar();
    }
    return ans;
}
long f[105][105], p[105][105], a[105], sum[105], n, mn = 1E9;
long w(long i, long j)
{
	return sum[j] - sum[i - 1]; 
}
void dfs(int l, int r) {
    if (l == r) {
        cout << a[r];
        return;
    }
    cout << '(';
    int mid = p[l][r];
    dfs(l, mid);
    cout << ")(";
    dfs(mid + 1, r);
    cout << ')';
}
long dg(int i, int j) 
{
    long x, y;
    if(i==j)return 0;
    if (f[i][j] != -1) 
	{
        return f[i][j];
    }
    f[i][j]=1E9;
    for (int k = i; k <= j; k++) 
	{
        if (f[i][j] > dg(i, k) + dg(k + 1, j) + w(i, j)) 
		{
            f[i][j] = dg(i, k) + dg(k + 1, j) + w(i, j);
            p[i][j] = k;
        }
    }
    return f[i][j];
}
int main() {
    memset(f,-1, sizeof(f));
    n = read();
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        a[i] = read();
        p[i][i]=i;
	}
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + a[i];
    }
    printf("%ld\n", dg(1, n));
    dfs(1, n);
}

	n=read();//åˆç”¨äº†å¿«è¯»ï¼Œæˆ‘æ˜¯æœ‰ç—…å—ï¼Ÿ
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{

		f[i][i]=f[i+n][i+n]=0;//åˆå§‹åŒ–f

		s[i+n][i+n]=i+n;//åŒä¸Š

å¯¹äº†ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯ä¸ªç¯ï¼Œä½†åšäº†ç‰ˆæœ¬äºŒåç¯å·²ç»åºŸäº†ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯æ¥åŠ å¤§æ•°æ®çš„

	for(int k=2;k<=n/2;k++)//åŒºé—´å¤§å°
	{
		for(int i=n-k+1;i>=1;i--)//ä»å¤§åˆ°å°æšä¸¾èµ·ç‚¹
		{
			int j=i+k-1,x,y;//æ±‚ç»ˆç‚¹
			if(s[i][j-1])//å¦‚æœs(i,j-1)ä¸º0ï¼Œä»iå¼€å§‹
			{
				x=s[i][j-1];
			}
			else
			{
				x=i;
			}
			if(s[i+1][j])//å¦‚æœs(i+1,j)ä¸º0ï¼Œä»jç»“æŸ
			{
				y=s[i+1][j];

			{
				if(f[i][j]>f[i][l]+f[l+1][j]+w(i,j))
				{
					f[i][j]=f[i][l]+f[l+1][j]+w(i,j);
					s[i][j]=l;
				}
			}
		} 		
	}

è¾“å‡ºå³å¯

ä¸Šä»£ç ï¼š

æ²¡å¿ä½æ‰“äº†ä¸ªå¿«è¯»

#include<stdio.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

inline int read() 
{
    int ans = 0;
    char c = getchar();
    while ((c < '0' || c > '9') && (c != '-'))
	{
		c = getchar();
	}
    ans = c - '0';
	c = getchar();
    while (c >= '0' && c <= '9') 
	{
		ans = (ans << 3) + (ans << 1) + c - '0';
		c = getchar();
	}
    return ans;
}
long f[5005][5005],s[5005][5005],a[5005],sum[5005],n,mn=1E8;
long w(long i,long j)
{
	return sum[j]-sum[i-1];
}
int main()
{
	memset(f,127,sizeof(f));
	n=read();
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		a[i]=a[i+n]=read();
		f[i][i]=f[i+n][i+n]=0;
		s[i][i]=i;
		s[i+n][i+n]=i+n;
	}
	n*=2;
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		sum[i]=sum[i-1]+a[i];
	}
	for(int k=2;k<=n/2;k++)
	{
		for(int i=n-k+1;i>=1;i--)
		{
			int j=i+k-1,x,y;
			if(s[i][j-1])
			{
				x=s[i][j-1];
			}
			else
			{
				x=i;
			}
			if(s[i+1][j])
			{
				y=s[i+1][j];
			}
			else
			{
				y=j;
			}			
			for(int l=x;l<=y;l++)
			{
				if(f[i][j]>f[i][l]+f[l+1][j]+w(i,j))
				{
					f[i][j]=f[i][l]+f[l+1][j]+w(i,j);
					s[i][j]=l;
				}
			}
		} 		
	}	
	for(int i=1;i<=n/2;i++)
	{
		mn=min(mn,f[i][i+n/2-1]);
	}
	printf("%d",mn);
}
